definition: occurring in or belonging to the present time, a steady flow of a fluid (usually from natural causes)
details:
adjective
- occurring in or belonging to the present time
= example: occurring in or belonging to the present time
noun
- a steady flow of a fluid (usually from natural causes)
= example: a steady flow of a fluid (usually from natural causes)
= synonyms: stream
- dominant course (suggestive of running water) of successive events or ideas
= synonyms: flow
- a flow of electricity through a conductor
= example: a flow of electricity through a conductor
= synonyms: electric current
